interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Make-up Organizers Storage Cosmetic Organizer Display Case Dustproof Storage Box Waterproof Holder Used for Bathroom w/Handle Christmas Gift 12"L x 16"H White
Review Date: 2020/11/06
Store: LOMANTOWN
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Mounting Type Tabletop Mount': '', '': 'Unit Count 1.00 Count', 'Specific Uses For Product': 'Makeup Organizer,Cosmetic Organizer,Bathroom', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof,Durable', 'Brand': 'LOMANTOWN', 'Package Type': 'Standard Packaging', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '17.25 x 13.25 x 10.35 inches; 5.6 Pounds'}
Review Text: I am not impressed with this makeup organizer.  This organizer reminds me of the inexpensive makeup box I use to buy my girls when they were 6 years old.  I expected a lot more from this organizer considering it cost almost $55.  This is a plastic organizer.  The organizer has some scuff marks on the body and then a couple on the clear top lid.  I am disappointed with this organizer especially at this price point.
Review Title: Not Impressed
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Del Monte Sauerkraut 14.5 oz. (3-Pack) {'Package Dimensions': '8.4 x 4.9 x 2.9 inches; 14.46 Ounces', 'UPC': '741655221609'} We have strayed from a national name brand of sauer kraut and was that a big mistake. The store brand was one that almost everyone set aside on their plate and did not eat. We went back to a name brand and that was Del Monte. The kraut we think is the best on the market. We do nto like that other kinds of kraut such as Bavarian. We want the real stuff, at least to us it is the real stuff. Did you know the whole 14.5 oz can only has 10 calories in it and zero fat. Even for carbs there is only 1g. Now this is where we definitely go wrong as we serve it with smoked sausage, which we know is totally off the chart. Don't do this often---just occasionally. The meal is delicious. I do have a note fro Del Monte. Remember when your cans contained 16 oz of kraut, then you cut back and now it's 14.5 oz. Please quit doing this to us!.Do you realize, and I am sure you do, that I now have about 10% LESS to serve to my family. Some Of The Best Sauer Kraut There Is ! Spa Grade Jade Roller for Face with Gua Sha | Jade Face Roller Massager | Jade Facial Roller | Face Roller Massager | Jade Rollers | Wrinkle Roller Jane Cosmetics {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 3.4 x 1.2 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '814689026516', 'Manufacturer': 'Jane & Co.'} This Jade face roller and Jade Gua Sha tool comes packaged nicely. This roller is a little nicer than the last one I reviewed, therefore the reason for the 5 start. We enjoy using this one more than our other one. This is better put together and seems to be a grade or two better. Jade Roller Mountain Falls Regular Nail Polish Remover for Natural Nails with Vitamin E and Panthenol, 10 Fluid Ounce Mountain Falls {'Brand': 'Mountain Falls', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Item Weight': '0.7 Pounds', 'Unit Count': '10 Fl Oz'} Another quality product from Mountain Falls. This Regular Nail Polish Remover does its job. It is easy to remove old nail polish using this product. This is a 10 oz bottle of polish remover. Good nail polish remover. Works Well. Wonder4 Electric Callus Remover - Rechargeable Electric Foot File Callus Shaver Hard Skin Remover Pedicure Tools with 3 in 1 Roller Heads, for Cracked Heels Calluses and Dead Skin Wonder4 {'Brand': 'Wonder4', 'Is Electric': 'Yes', 'Item Form': 'Roller', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Unit Count': '11.4 Ounce'} I already have a single disk callus remover but this triple disk callus remover is much nicer. This remover has 1 head that rotates to 3 different buffing disks. There is a rough, medium and smooth grinding disk. These disk do a great job. There is a small cleaning brush and a USB cord include. The device appears to be well made. The speed on the head is good and does not slow down when using. I have only charged this device once and it is still running. This is a good product at a good price. Highly recommend. Good Triple Disk Callus Remover DAN Technology Anti-Scald 200℉-500℉ Electric Press Hot Comb for Black Hair, Beard and Wigs, Ceramic Unisex Hair Beard Straightener and Curler, Dual Voltage for Travel, Home and Salon Use DAN Technology {'Brand': 'DAN Technology', 'Hair Type': 'All, Curly', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Size': 'Medium', 'Item Weight': '0.6 Pounds', 'Package Dimensions': '12.9 x 4.8 x 2.4 inches; 9.6 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'DAN Technology'} My daughter really likes this Dan Technology Hot Comb.

There are several features that she likes.
1. The cord swivels 360 degrees. No more tangled up cord.
2. Variable temperature. (200-500 degree)
3. Fairly fast heat up.
4. Easy grip handle. The handle is small enough for her to grip easily.
5. The head still heated the entire time she was doing her hair.

She is happy with this heated comb. Daughter Likes This Straightening Hot Comb MEACOLIA Water Mist Empty Spray Bottle for Hair,Plastic Spray Bottle for Cleaning Solutions,Refillable Container with Adjustable Head(Pack of 3,8 oz) MEACOLIA {'Brand': 'MEACOLIA', 'Capacity': '2.4 Pounds', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Special Feature': 'Adjustable Head, Mist Spray', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '10.08 x 6.85 x 3.23 inches; 4.97 Ounces', 'UPC': '190431086381'} There are 3 clear plastic spray bottles in this set. All the bottles are the same 8 oz size. I like the spray handles. They fit in my hand and are easy to spray. The sprayer can be set 3 ways.... OFF, STREAM, and MIST. I am currently using the mist on my plants. The liquid comes out evenly and does not drip out of the nozzle. The pick up hose inside the bottle goes all the way to the bottom so you get all the liquid. These are 3 good spray bottles and well worth the price. Good size plastic spray bottles Spray Bottle,Fine Mist Mini Clear50ml/2oz Spray Bottles,Small Reusable Empty Plastic Bottles with Atomizer Pumps (25 pack,2 Funnels included) Woaiwo-q {'Brand': 'Woaiwo-q', 'Material': 'Polypropylene', 'Capacity': '50 Milliliters, 60 Milliliters', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray'} These are nice small, short plastic bottles. The bottles are approx 3" tall. Each bottle comes with a fine spray mister. The bottles hold 2 oz each. These are nice small bottles. These only come out to be 32 cents each. They are will worth this cost if you need bottles this small. Small Short Fine Mist Plastic Bottle Make-up Organizers Storage Cosmetic Organizer Display Case Dustproof Storage Box Waterproof Holder Used for Bathroom w/Handle Christmas Gift 12"L x 16"H White LOMANTOWN {'Mounting Type Tabletop Mount': '', '': 'Unit Count 1.00 Count', 'Specific Uses For Product': 'Makeup Organizer,Cosmetic Organizer,Bathroom', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof,Durable', 'Brand': 'LOMANTOWN', 'Package Type': 'Standard Packaging', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '17.25 x 13.25 x 10.35 inches; 5.6 Pounds'} I am not impressed with this makeup organizer. This organizer reminds me of the inexpensive makeup box I use to buy my girls when they were 6 years old. I expected a lot more from this organizer considering it cost almost $55. This is a plastic organizer. The organizer has some scuff marks on the body and then a couple on the clear top lid. I am disappointed with this organizer especially at this price point. Not Impressed
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Brand Loyalty:** Continues to prefer national name brands, emphasizing quality and reliability in product performance. However, recent experiences indicate a higher expectation for value in relation to price.

- **Product Preferences:** Maintains a strong inclination toward practical and multifunctional tools that enhance user experience across personal care and household categories. Recent interactions reveal increased scrutiny of product quality and design, highlighting a commitment to user-friendliness and durability.

- **Health-Conscious Choices:** Retains a focus on low-calorie, low-fat options alongside occasional indulgences, extending this health-conscious perspective to personal care products with an emphasis on natural ingredients and efficacy.

- **Consumer Advocacy:** Demonstrates a vigilant stance on product consistency and transparency, particularly regarding high-quality standards in food and wellness items. Recent dissatisfaction with a purchased product suggests heightened expectations for performance.

- **Culinary Traditions and Self-Care:** Expresses enthusiasm for integrating flavorful condiments into meals while balancing healthful options. Though dedicated to enhancing self-care through thoughtful design, recent feedback indicates an awareness of potential shortcomings in product quality.

The user’s recent review reflects a desire for better value and performance expectations, impacting future purchasing decisions while emphasizing their ongoing preference for high-quality, functional products that align with both practicality and aesthetic appeal.
